Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is partially covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of six lines of Greek text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393781) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393781)
